rationale: No intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifies a risk-adjective.
The segment reports action factually ('has also stepped up surveillance efforts') without high-potency framing.
Neutral language used; no moderate verb paired with scale/impact.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
This segment reports actions being taken and lacks explicit calming language.
Segment does not contain a minimiser used with scale contrast.
The segment states USDA has stepped up surveillance but contains no bare negation.
States the USDA 'has also stepped up surveillance efforts'.
